backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, photo/video/document/memory management with role-based access control, storage limits per category (30% each for photos/documents/videos), file size limits, and admin analytics endpoints including aggregate storage summaries and user counts.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that adds _virtualCanisterCount field to actor state while preserving existing user profiles, photos, documents, and videos data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implementation of admin dashboard with master principal verification, analytics display, storage insights, React Query hooks, and navigation integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, and hooks with details on authentication, PIN verification, storage monitoring, admin dashboard, and multi-language support.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for AS19 Private Love Themed Memory Management App with mobile-optimized viewport settings and PWA capabilities.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component managing authentication flow, profile/PIN setup, language preference synchronization between frontend and backend, routing to all pages including admin dashboard, and theme provider integration.
Reusable metric card component for admin dashboard displaying title, value, subtitle, icon with custom colors, and optional progress bar with dark-themed styling and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/AdminStorageTabl: Displays an admin table showing storage usage breakdown by category (photos, videos, documents, memories) with file counts, sizes, and percentages. Supports Hindi/English localization and formats bytes into MB/GB.
Renders a simple banner with gradient text displaying "Created By Azad" at the top of the application.
Displays a grid of uploaded documents with download and delete functionality for admins. Shows file icons based on content type, file sizes, and handles loading/empty states with Hindi/English support.
frontend/src/components/DocumentStorageM: Shows a card displaying document storage usage with a progress bar and warning alert when storage exceeds 80%. Formats sizes in MB/GB with bilingual support.
frontend/src/components/DocumentUpload.t: Provides document upload functionality with file type validation (PDF, DOCX, TXT, Excel), 50MB size limit, and upload progress tracking. Supports Hindi/English localization.
frontend/src/components/LanguageSelector: Renders a language selection screen with English/Hindi options, featuring an elegant UI with floating decorative elements, AS19 logo, and glass-effect styling.
frontend/src/components/MemoriesStorageM: Displays a card showing memories storage usage with progress bar and warning alert at 80% capacity. Formats sizes in MB/GB with bilingual support.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Top navigation bar component with logo, section tabs (media, photos, videos, documents, memories, storage, profile, admin), PIN lock status indicator, and user avatar with logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/PhotoGallery.tsx: Photo gallery component displaying photos in a grid with selection, deletion, download (single/batch), and lightbox preview features; shows notifications for newly added photos.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUpload.tsx: Photo upload component with drag-and-drop support, file validation (15MB limit, image types only), preview thumbnails, progress tracking, and batch upload to backend storage.
frontend/src/components/PinChangeForm.ts: Form component for changing user PIN that verifies current PIN, validates new PIN (4-6 digits), confirms match, and clears session after successful change.
frontend/src/components/PinReset.tsx: PIN reset component requiring Internet Identity reauthentication with principal verification, then allows setting a new PIN and clears the session.
frontend/src/components/PinSetup.tsx: Component for setting up a new 4-6 digit numeric PIN with confirmation field, validation, and error handling. Saves PIN to user profile with language preference.
Component for verifying an existing PIN to unlock the app, with error handling and option to navigate to PIN reset flow.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: Initial profile setup component that collects user's name and language preference, with error handling for authentication and backend connection issues.
frontend/src/components/ScreenshotProtec: Empty component file, likely intended for screenshot protection functionality but not yet implemented.
frontend/src/components/StorageMonitor.t: Displays photo storage usage metrics with progress bar and warnings when storage exceeds 80% or reaches limit, showing used/total in MB/GB.
frontend/src/components/StoryEditor.tsx: Form component for creating new memories with title and description fields, submitting to backend via createMemory mutation.
frontend/src/components/StoryList.tsx: Displays list of memories with edit/delete capabilities for admins, including dialogs for editing and confirmation for deletion, with formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusIndica: Displays a badge showing sync status (offline, syncing, error, success, online) with Hindi labels and icons, using the useSyncStatus hook to track connection and sync state.
frontend/src/components/TotalStorageMoni: Card component that displays total storage usage across photos, videos, documents, and memories with a progress bar and breakdown by category, supporting Hindi/English labels.
frontend/src/components/VideoGallery.tsx: Displays a grid of video cards with thumbnails, play/download/delete actions, and a video player dialog; supports admin deletion and shows loading/empty states with bilingual UI.
frontend/src/components/VideoStorageMoni: Card component showing video storage usage with progress bar and warning alert when storage exceeds 80%, displaying sizes in MB/GB with Hindi labels.
frontend/src/components/VideoUpload.tsx: Handles video file upload with thumbnail generation, progress tracking, 100MB size limit validation, and bilingual toast notifications using ExternalBlob for ICP storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity state, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguage.ts: Zustand store with persist middleware for managing user language preference (Hindi/English) and tracking whether language has been selected.
frontend/src/hooks/usePinSession.ts: Hook for managing PIN verification session state using sessionStorage, providing methods to verify PIN, check verification status, and clear session.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Comprehensive React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, photos, videos, documents, memories, storage management, and admin functions with configured sync intervals and storage limits.
frontend/src/hooks/useSyncStatus.ts: Hook that monitors online/offline status and tracks React Query sync state, providing real-time sync status including last sync time and errors.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system for light/dark themes, mobile optimizations, and utility classes for modern gradients and effects.
frontend/src/lib/googleOAuth.ts: Empty file, likely placeholder for future Google OAuth integration.
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: TypeScript type definitions for all translation keys used throughout the app covering welcome, navigation, profile, PIN system, dashboard, storage, and media management sections.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin-only dashboard page displaying system metrics (user count, canister count, storage usage) with access control and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Empty file, likely placeholder for main user dashboard page.
frontend/src/pages/DocumentsPage.tsx: Documents management page with PIN verification gate, showing document upload (admin only) and gallery components with created-by banner.
frontend/src/pages/MediaCenterPage.tsx: Main media center landing page displaying category cards (Photos, Videos, Documents, Memories) with upload/view options and admin controls. Includes language support, logout functionality, and responsive layout with atmospheric background effects.
frontend/src/pages/MemoriesPage.tsx: Memories page with PIN verification that displays StoryEditor (admin only), StoryList, and storage monitor components. Includes rose petal background overlay and CreatedByBanner.
frontend/src/pages/OAuthCallback.tsx: Empty OAuth callback page file with no implementation.
frontend/src/pages/PhotosPage.tsx: Photos page with PIN verification that displays PhotoUpload (admin only) and PhotoGallery components. Includes rose petal background and CreatedByBanner.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: User profile management page with editable name, language preference, profile picture upload/removal, and PIN change functionality. Includes validation, toast notifications, and bilingual support.
Admin storage dashboard displaying total and per-category (Photos, Videos, Documents, Memories) storage metrics with progress bars, usage percentages, and formatted size displays. Includes TotalStorageMonitor component and bilingual support.
frontend/src/pages/VideosPage.tsx: Videos page with PIN verification that displays VideoUpload (admin only) and VideoGallery components. Includes rose petal background and CreatedByBanner.
frontend/src/pages/WelcomePage.tsx: Landing/welcome page with Internet Identity login, featuring animated decorative elements, bilingual support, and feature highlights. Handles login flow with error handling and toast notifications.
frontend/src/types/frontend-types.ts: TypeScript type definitions for frontend-only features including DocumentMetadata, DocumentUploadRequest, MemoryMetadata, MemoryUploadRequest, and EditMemoryRequest interfaces (backend not yet implemented).
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system with CSS variables, responsive breakpoints, container settings, custom spacing for safe areas, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state document for AS19 MultiDrive tracking architectural decisions (zero-knowledge privacy, cross-lock virtual canisters), known issues (Internet Identity auth bugs, PIN reset security), and feature implementation status for the Master Admin Dashboard with user analytics and storage insights.
